original_text: Now Ephron was sitting among the Hittites, and Ephron the Hittite answered Abraham in the hearing of the Hittites, of all who went in at the gate of his city,
korean_text: 에브론이 헷 족속 중에 앉아 있더니 그가 헷 족속 곧 성문에 들어온 모든 자가 듣는 데서 아브라함에게 대답하여 이르되

sentences.original_text: Now Ephron was sitting among the Hittites,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 에브론은 헷 족속 중에 앉아 있었고,

sentences.original_text: and Ephron the Hittite answered Abraham
in the hearing of the Hittites,
of all who went in at the gate of his city,
sentences.korean_translation: 곧 그 성읍 문에 드나드는 모든 자의 앞에서
